Interpretation
Citation
Antidiabetics
In one study, fenugreek saponins had modest additional antidiabetic effects when they were added to established treatment with sulfonylureas.
Lu F, Shen L, Qin Y, Gao L, Li H, Dai Y. Clinical observation on Trigonella Foenum-graecum L. total saponins in combination with sulfonylureas in the treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus. Chin J Intergr Med (2008) 14, 56-60.
Food
No interactions found. Fenugreek is often used as a flavouring in foodstuffs.

Herbal medicines
No interactions found.

Warfarin and related drugs
For a case report describing a raised INR in patient taking a herbal medicine containing boldo and fenugreek, see Boldo + Warfarin and related drugs, page 88.
